title: Messages of Love and Healing
description: Jennie Malone works with the spirit world to deliver messages to their loved ones. But one customer wants nothing to do with a particular spirit, and the determined ghost wonâ€™t leave Jennie alone. Meanwhile, her family wants her to close her shop down and stop dabbling in the occult. Can Jennie make everyone happy, or will she have to choose between her family and her passion? And speaking of passion, will she ever find true love? =======This is Book #1 in Jennie's Gifts Series [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00SNP67Q0]
author: Lynn Thomas
